items.sentence: Tom said that he could make it to the party.
Tom tried to stop Mary from talking to John.
Tom couldn\'t hold onto the rope any longer.
Tom couldn\'t imagine his life without Mary.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he put his pen.
Tom couldn\'t stand the suspense any longer.
Tom couldn\'t think of anything else to try.
Tom couldn\'t understand anything Mary said.
I can\'t fix it. It\'ll have to be replaced.
I can\'t go with you because I\'m very busy.
If you need an umbrella, I can lend you one.
If you need me to do something, just say so.
If you won a million yen, what would you do?
In order to do that, you have to take risks.
In the heat of the moment, Tom slapped Mary.
When was the last time you had a girlfriend?
When was the last time you had a steady job?
When was the last time you used a toll road?
When was the last time you washed your hair?
I\'ll have Tom bring up some dinner for you.
